name: revoke_role_request
short_doc: Revoke membership in a role from a user or role
doc: Revokes membership in a role from a user or role.

fields.name: role
fields.doc: Name of the role in which membership will be revoked. Must be an existing role.

fields.name: member
fields.doc: Name of the user or role that will be revoked membership in @{input role}. Must be an existing user or role.
